events.title: Petra Schelm is killed in a shootout with police

movie.title: The Baader Meinhof Complex
movie.plot: Der Baader Meinhof Komplex depicts the political turmoil in the period from 1967 to the bloody "Deutschen Herbst" in 1977. The movie approaches the events based on Stefan Aust's standard work on Die Rote Armee Fraktion (RAF). The story centers on the leadership of the self named anti-fascist resistance to state violence: Andreas Baader, Ulrike Meinhof and Gudrun Ensslin.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 20 nominations.

events.title: Christine Chubbuck commits suicide live on air

movie.title: Christine
movie.plot: The story of Christine Chubbuck, a 1970s TV reporter struggling with depression and professional frustrations as she tries to advance her career.

events.title: Dexter Mayhew and Emma Morley agree to just be friends

movie.title: One Day
movie.plot: A romantic comedy centered on Dexter and Emma, who first meet during their graduation in 1988 and proceed to keep in touch regularly. The film follows what they do on July 15 annually, usually doing something together.

events.title: Richard Davis, who Mike Deerfield is based on, is killed

movie.title: In the Valley of Elah
movie.plot: A career officer and his wife work with a police detective to uncover the truth behind their son's disappearance following his return from a tour of duty in Iraq.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 22 nominations.

events.title: the existence of the Stuxnet worm is made public via a blog post

movie.title: Zero Days
movie.plot: Alex Gibney explores the phenomenon of Stuxnet, a self-replicating computer virus discovered in 2010 by international IT experts. Evidently commissioned by the US and Israeli governments, this malware was designed to specifically sabotage Iranâ€™s nuclear programme. However, the complex computer worm ended up not only infecting its intended target but also spreading uncontrollably.

events.title: the Peace at Home Council, part of the armed forces, attempt a coup in Turkey

movie.title: Kurtlar Vadisi Vatan
movie.plot: Polat Alemdar Erhan and Cahit are yet again on the front lines only to discover a military coup attempt in Turkey.
